title: ShopEase: Update admin login UI copy and frontend documentation for reset default credentials

requirements.summary: Update `/admin/login` helper text to state the reset default admin password is `Admin@123` (keep username text unchanged).
acceptanceCriteria: On `/admin/login`, the helper text under "Default admin username: admin" indicates the current password is `Admin@123` (English text).
All existing admin login form validations and error messaging remain functional.

file_operations.description: Update the helper text beneath "Default admin username: admin" to explicitly state the current default password is `Admin@123` in English, replacing the existing deployment-time wording, without altering existing validation, submit handling, or error messaging.

requirements.summary: Update frontend README to document the admin login URL and default admin credentials (admin / Admin@123) in English.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/README.md` includes the admin login URL `/admin/login` and lists the default admin username as `admin` and password as `Admin@123` in English.
Documentation is consistent with the actual deployed behavior (credentials work as written).

file_operations.description: Add an "Admin Login" section (or equivalent) that explicitly documents the admin login URL `/admin/login` and the default admin credentials: username `admin`, password `Admin@123`, using English user-facing text.
